Title: Prohibits the sale of a firearm, rifle, shotgun or ammunition on state property
Summary: Prohibits the sale of a firearm, rifle, shotgun or ammunition on state property including state and county fairgrounds, and county, city and municipal property; designates offense as a class A misdemeanor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of a firearm, rifle, shotgun or ammunition on state property
